plane.models

Class PlacedShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • plane.models.PlacedShape

  • public class PlacedShape
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class PlacedShape. Any entity being placed on the board must be of this class type. A PlacedShape will have its initial Polygon state, when user first enters the PuzzleSolving Board. A PlaedShape will have its changed Polygon state, after several operations by user, and a ShapeStatus to record detailed status information of the changed Polygon.
    Author:
    cheng zhu
